notes: ## [1.3.3] - 2026-02-15  ### Changed - **README Redesign**: Improved badge styling with centered layout and better visual hierarchy - **Features Documentation**: Reorganized features into clear categories (Core Functionality, Premium Interface, Advanced Features) - **Badge Style**: Updated from flat-square to modern flat-square with custom colors and logos  ### Fixed - **CI/CD**: Resolved GitHub Actions permissions issue preventing automatic updater.json updates - **Release Workflow**: Added proper authentication for automated commits during release process
